Uses of Class
Graph

  • Packages that use Graph 
    Package Description
    <Unnamed>  

    • Uses of Graph in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Graph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int OptimalFinalSchedule.bruteForceColoring(Graph g)
      use the brute force method to find an optimal coloring solution
      void OptimalFinalSchedule.colorK(int k, int n, int m, Graph g)
      try all coloring ways by DFS, until get a solution
      pre-condition: k >= 0 && k < MAX && n >= 0 && n < MAX && m >= 1 && g != null
      post-condition: graph g is colored if the number of colors m is feasible, otherwise g is uncolored
      LinkedList FinalSchedule.greedyColoring(Graph g, int c)
      Use greedy algorithm to color the graph from vertex 0
      boolean OptimalFinalSchedule.isColorRight(int k, Graph g)
      check whether the color of k conflicts with the other vertices
      pre-condition: k >= 0 && k < MAX && g != null
      post-condition: return true if the color is right false otherwise
